title: The Real Reason Behind The Media’s Hunter Biden Coverage (Ep 1737)
description:
In this episode, I address the real reason liberal media outlets are covering the exploding Hunter Biden scandal. 

News Picks:


The TSA has gone full woke!


Disney keeps digging. 


Medical student finds herself in hot water after alleged patient abuse.

The clowns at the Washington Post finally admit the Hunter emails are real. 

Biden emails expose the depths of the Biden family corruption. 

Americans are facing a $5,200 inflation tax this year. 


Another CDC scandal emerges.
